thread.title: Simbu to shoot a song in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Simbu to shoot a song in Mumbai | Tamil Movie News - Times of India

author: Logesh Balachandran
title: Simbu to shoot a song in Mumbai
text: Simbu, who is actively involved in the jallikattu protests, we hear, will fly to Mumbai soon. A source says that the crew of Anbanavan Asaradhavan Adangadhavan (AAA) will be shooting the intro song of one of Simbu's characters in the film, `Ashwin Thatha', there. 'The team is planning to shoot the song in a grand manner. In fact, the lyrics of the song is penned by Simbu himself. Initially , he was reluctant to write the lyrics, but later he agreed to it as it was about his favourite topics, philosophy and life,' says the source.
